lines.text: From Here to Maternity]
You gonna feed it?
Uh-Huh.
And burp it?
Uh-Huh.
And change it?
NUH-HUH!
Hey HEY, hey!
What's Happening!
This is true...
Maria, would you like to dance?
I don't know any of your dancing.
Just stick with me.
[begins dancing irratically, poorly to music]
What do you call this dance?
The "Funky Clutz!"
I can't help it if I'm fat! It runs in my family.
Nobody runs in your family... they all waddle!

[on phone]
Hello, is this the Doobie Brothers? Which Doobie you be?
Okay, Raj, that'll be ninety-five cents please.
Here's a dollar and you can keep the change.
Oh, Raj gave me a nickel! Not four pennies but a nickel! Raj gave the kid a nickel!
Here's an extra dime.
Thank you very much there.
[Raj is pretending to be ill with memory loss for a practical joke on Dee]
I'm just going to go feed the cat...
We don't have a cat.
We don't? But what happened to the cat?
We never *had* a cat!
Then what's that playing in the bathtub with the pony?
Oh, *Raj*.
I'm going to go turn in.
Okay, say hi to the pony for me.
I will. You're such a nice little boy.
Roger... give me your belt...
[makes joke and laughs]
That's funny!
Of course it is!
No, I mean the way your belly shakes when you laugh!

[enters and slams door]
"Hey HEY, hey!"
Don't you see me studying? Why can't you come in like a gentleman?

[exits, returns, checks clothes and hair. Marches over like a 'gentleman']
"Hey. Hey. Hey."
Ralph represents all that which is good, and pure - Ralph is a head... of lettuce.
You worship a HEAD OF LETTUCE?
[Dwayne hangs Rerun's pants over his IV bag]
Dwayne, you hung my pants on my dinner.
[Dwayne looks confused but says nothing]
See this here tube, it goes straight down to Rerun's arm.
You mean they're feeding his arm? Does his mouth know about that?
